name: Mega Kick
description: Make a melee attack against a target, doing 2d10 + MOVE normal damage on a hit.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d8 at level 5, 4d10 at level 10, and 7d8 at level 17.

effect.name: Works better the more excited the crowd is.
effect.effect: You gain Appeal points equal to the crowd meter level plus 1.
